entry.title: Wednesday night: A few clouds. Low minus 7.
entry.summary: A few clouds. Increasing cloudiness overnight. Wind west 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light near midnight. Low minus 7. Wind chill minus 13 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM AST Wednesday 22 February 2023

entry.title: Thursday: Periods of snow. Temperature steady near minus 7.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Periods of snow beginning in the morning. Amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind up to 15 km/h. Temperature steady near minus 7. Wind chill near minus 13. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 4:00 PM AST Wednesday 22 February 2023

entry.title: Thursday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 10. POP 60%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 60 percent chance of flurries in the evening and after midnight. Snow beginning after midnight. Amount 2 cm. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 10. Wind chill near minus 17. Forecast issued 4:00 PM AST Wednesday 22 February 2023
